organic.title: ∎ Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds ∎ New VIRTUA FIGHTER ...

organic.title: Materiality of the SEGA SAMMY Group｜Sustainability at ...
organic.snippet: To create captivating experiences, we need to be a game changer. Making Life More Colorful—This commitment drives the SEGA SAMMY Group's global business expansion. By adapting to rapid changes in society and value systems, we will ensure that we can continue to create captivating experiences.

organic.title: At the Forefront
organic.snippet: In the pachislot machine business, during the interim period the SEGA SAMMY Group introduced a number of models offering a range of game features and high entertainment value. These included Hokuto No Ken SE, a pachislot machine with entertain- ment features that exceed even those of its predecessor, the Hokuto No Ken.

organic.title: Market Trend - SEGA SAMMY HOLDINGS
